Text: ReYou Vince J CT PM To Tasha NRON cc Vince J CT Grant CT Subject Re Tasha Yes I think Li Xiao deserves the bonus Vince Kaminski Tasha NRON PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Vince Linda Vargo asked me because I am the administrator of employee referral program to contact you on whether or not Li Xiao is eligible for a bonus on his referral of Alex Huang I have informed Linda that the decision up to you If you feel that Alex Huang was hired as a result of Li bringing him to the attention of Enron then the bonus is due Linda and yourself have communicated via email on this issue in early February and it appears from that correspondence that Li did encourage Alex to email his resume to you Please advise as to whether or not you want to award the bonus Thank You

ReYou Vince J CT PM To Tasha NRON cc Vince J CT Grant CT Subject Re Tasha Yes I think Li Xiao deserves the bonus Vince Kaminski Tasha NRON PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Vince Linda Vargo asked me because I am the administrator of employee referral program to contact you on whether or not Li Xiao is eligible for a bonus on his referral of Alex Huang I have informed Linda that the decision up to you If you feel that Alex Huang was hired as a result of Li bringing him to the attention of Enron then the bonus is due Linda and yourself have communicated via email on this issue in early February and it appears from that correspondence that Li did encourage Alex to email his resume to you Please advise as to whether or not you want to award the bonus Thank You

Enron Employee Referral Programis to acknowledge receipt of your referral form for Scott Schaunaman The candidate you referred has been entered into our system making it available for all current and future appropriate opportunities with Enron We have also forwarded the resume to the responsible recruiters for the positions you recommended You will be eligible for a referral bonus until should this candidate be hired for any position Thank you for your participation in the Enron Employee Referral program
